description: Consider the problem of placing N queens on an n X n board so that each queen attacks precisely 3 others. Sequence gives maximal number of queens.
references: Martin Gardner, The Last Recreations, Copernicus, NY, 1997, 274-283.
Peter Hayes, A Problem of Chess Queens, Journal of Recreational Mathematics, Baywood, 24(4), 1992, 264-271T)
